channel.title: [PI] Shop buy back price!?
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I want to make it so when you bought a item from the shop the shop only buys it back for 90% of the price you've payed. This to not have people buying a gear, using it and being able to just sell it back without making any loss.
Thank you,
Unique
